>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/claim/{network}/locks/{lockAddress}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Claim a membership key for a lock. If not authenticated, requires an email in the body.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"network","required":true,"description":"Network id.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"in":"path","name":"lockAddress","required":true,"description":"Lock address.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"captcha","in":"header","required":true,"description":"Recaptcha value to pass.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"recipient","in":"header","required":false,"description":"Recipient address for key","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"type":"string"},"email":{"type":"string","description":"Email address of the recipient"},"recipient":{"type":"string","description":"Recipient address for key"},"referrer":{"type":"string","description":"Referrer address used to mint. This may get overwritten."}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully claimed the key.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"transactionHash":{"type":"string"},"owner":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"401":{"description":"User is not authenticated.","content":{"application":{"schema":{"type":"object","nullable":false,"properties":{"message":{"type":"string","default":"There was an error in fullfiling the request.","nullable":false}},"title":"GenericServerError"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
